name: v1.8.0
body:
## What's Changed
Feature changes:
* Change symlink following behavior by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/118

BCR maintenance changes:
* Move the `-std=c++20` option to the BUILD target by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/145
* Reinstate `bcr_test_module` root key in presubmit.yml by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/146
* Chance BCR source url template to release download url by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/147
* Make skylib a non-dev dep by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/148


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.7.5...v1.8.0


## `MODULE.bazel` setup:
```Starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_appimage", version = "1.8.0")
```

## `WORKSPACE` setup:
```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "16cb94cb0305564d47d965cc5dadb12fb95aa00b2936e52c1c3b4e21975bba47",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.8.0",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/releases/download/v1.8.0/rules_appimage-1.8.0.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories", "python_register_toolchains")

py_repositories()

python_register_toolchains(
    name = "rules_appimage_python",
    python_version = "3.12",
)

load("@rules_appimage_python//:defs.bzl", rules_appimage_py_interpreter="interpreter")
load("@rules_python//python:pip.bzl", "pip_parse")

pip_parse(
    name = "rules_appimage_py_deps",
    python_interpreter_target = rules_appimage_py_interpreter,
    requirements_lock = "@rules_appimage//:requirements.txt",
)

load("@rules_appimage_py_deps//:requirements.bzl", "install_deps")

install_deps()

register_toolchains("@rules_appimage//appimage:all")
```

This is a maintenance release without any feature changes.

## What's Changed
* Add bazel test matrix for BCR presubmit tests by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/132
* Fix macOS CI caching by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/133
* Massage bzlmod ci matrix by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/135
* simplify BCR presubmit by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/137
* Move some deps to bzlmod by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/136
* Add BuildBuddy BES and Remote Caching by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/138
* Add fallback readonly buildbuddy key by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/139
* Use BCR squashfs when using Bzmlod by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/141
* Stop VS Code / pyright from spinning out of control by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/142


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.7.4...v1.7.5


## `MODULE.bazel` setup:
```Starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_appimage", version = "1.7.5")
```

## `WORKSPACE` setup:
```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "92fcb1f733bcd9b8a1b8c829123fcd0cf7257b08b39a42e1dc82b16edf7ee048",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.7.5",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/releases/download/v1.7.5/rules_appimage-1.7.5.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories", "python_register_toolchains")

py_repositories()

python_register_toolchains(
    name = "rules_appimage_python",
    python_version = "3.12",
)

load("@rules_appimage_python//:defs.bzl", rules_appimage_py_interpreter="interpreter")
load("@rules_python//python:pip.bzl", "pip_parse")

pip_parse(
    name = "rules_appimage_py_deps",
    python_interpreter_target = rules_appimage_py_interpreter,
    requirements_lock = "@rules_appimage//:requirements.txt",
)

load("@rules_appimage_py_deps//:requirements.bzl", "install_deps")

install_deps()

register_toolchains("@rules_appimage//appimage:all")
```

## What's Changed
**Bzlmod and BCR setup**
* Add publish-to-bcr templates by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/106
* support root modules using python 3.8 by @shabanzd in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/115
* Simplify CI bzlmod matrix setup by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/124
* Add example by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/108
* Prepare release by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/128
* Add maintainer with email by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/129
* Add GitHub username by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/130
* Add back in module version by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/131

**General fixes/improvements**
* Suport root_symlinks by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/116
* Downgrade WORKSPACE rules_python to make Bazel 5 CI green by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/126

**Version upgrades**
* Update dependency rules_python to v0.29.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/121
* Update actions/cache action to v4 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/122
* Upgrade py requirements by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/125


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.6.0...v1.7.4


## `MODULE.bazel` setup:
```Starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_appimage", version = "1.7.4")
```

## `WORKSPACE` setup:
```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "d38be277ca88ba4897d1e92faa24ab147ce0df41daa6d5a2d9c66c48aa54722a",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.7.4",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/releases/download/v1.7.4/rules_appimage-1.7.4.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories", "python_register_toolchains")

py_repositories()

python_register_toolchains(
    name = "rules_appimage_python",
    python_version = "3.11",
)

load("@rules_appimage_python//:defs.bzl", rules_appimage_py_interpreter="interpreter")
load("@rules_python//python:pip.bzl", "pip_parse")

pip_parse(
    name = "rules_appimage_py_deps",
    python_interpreter_target = rules_appimage_py_interpreter,
    requirements_lock = "@rules_appimage//:requirements.txt",
)

load("@rules_appimage_py_deps//:requirements.bzl", "install_deps")

install_deps()

register_toolchains("@rules_appimage//appimage:all")
```

name: v1.6.0
body:
## What's Changed

* remove unneeded `bazel_dep`s by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/107
* Add `-pthread` by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/110
* Add `-lpthread` by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/111
* Support dangling symlinks created with `ctx.actions.declare_symlink` by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/112
* Remove absolute symlink tests by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/113
* bump version to 1.6.0 by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/114


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.5.0...v1.6.0


## `MODULE.bazel` setup:
```Starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_appimage", version = "1.6.0")
```

## `WORKSPACE` setup:

```Starlark
py_repositories()

python_register_toolchains(
    name = "rules_appimage_python",
    python_version = "3.11",
)

load("@rules_appimage_python//:defs.bzl", rules_appimage_py_interpreter="interpreter")
load("@rules_python//python:pip.bzl", "pip_parse")

pip_parse(
    name = "rules_appimage_py_deps",
    python_interpreter_target = rules_appimage_py_interpreter,
    requirements_lock = "@rules_appimage//:requirements.txt",

```

name: v1.5.0

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.4.0...v1.5.0

name: v1.4.0
body:
## What's Changed

### New and exciting
* Bazel 5/6/7 compatibility by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/100 (but no bzlmod support yet :crying_cat_face: )

### Docs
* Remove verbatim WORKSPACE instrcuctions from README.md by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/87
* Fix WORKSPACE setup by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/89

### Minor changes
* Silence compiler issues by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/90
* Mute `-Wunused-but-set-variable` by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/91
* Mute ALL squashfs warnings by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/96

### CI
* Remove Python test matrix by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/97
* Dont complain about py requirements sandboxing by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/98
* Don't run on all pushes, only on PRs and after landing on main by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/99

### Full Changelog
https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.3.0...v1.4.0

## `WORKSPACE` setup:
```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "61afde839bb60bf8c502741f4db920085ad5cb9d8d64ed81db3fd41c84b1af9d",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.4.0",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/archive/refs/tags/v1.4.0.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories", "python_register_toolchains")

py_repositories()

python_register_toolchains(
    name = "rules_appimage_python",
    python_version = "3.11",
)

load("@rules_appimage_python//:defs.bzl", rules_appimage_py_interpreter="interpreter")
load("@rules_python//python:pip.bzl", "pip_parse")

pip_parse(
    name = "rules_appimage_py_deps",
    python_interpreter_target = rules_appimage_py_interpreter,
    requirements_lock = "@rules_appimage//:requirements.txt",
)

load("@rules_appimage_py_deps//:requirements.bzl", "install_deps")

install_deps()

register_toolchains("@rules_appimage//appimage:all")
```

name: v1.3.0
body:
## `WORKSPACE` setup:
```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "041326e84995c64c2702bcb37d958e2a94dee8e4385eb2b309e4af82406f6aed",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.3.0",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/archive/refs/tags/v1.3.0.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories", "python_register_toolchains")

py_repositories()

python_register_toolchains(
    name = "rules_appimage_python",
    python_version = "3.11",
)

load("@rules_appimage_python//:defs.bzl", rules_appimage_py_interpreter="interpreter")
load("@rules_python//python:pip.bzl", "pip_parse")

pip_parse(
    name = "rules_appimage_py_deps",
    python_interpreter_target = rules_appimage_py_interpreter,
    requirements_lock = "@rules_appimage//:requirements.txt",
)

load("@rules_appimage_py_deps//:requirements.bzl", "install_deps")

install_deps()

register_toolchains("@rules_appimage//appimage:all")
```

## What's Changed

### New features
* Support cross-platform and cross-architecture builds using toolchains by @lgarbarini in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/72

### Internal changes
* Switch to Bazel-built mksquashfs by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/73
* use bazel-runfiles instead of accessing runfiles from rules_python by @shabanzd in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/86

### Linting and docs
* Use Trunk check by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/75
* Add some more details on appimages and two alternatives by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/82

### Renovate
* Update py deps by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/83
* Upgrade py (dev) requirements by @lalten in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/76
* chore(deps): update actions/checkout action to v4 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/77
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python to v0.26.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/80
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/81
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/84

## New Contributors
* @lgarbarini made their first contribution in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/72
* @shabanzd made their first contribution in https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/86

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/compare/v1.2.0...v1.3.0

Interesting changes from the last version include:
 * New `data` attribute on the `appimage` rule itself: https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/68


`WORKSPACE` setup:
```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "d59605787b22f0a3a122b8d26333973a2098c58c13119ac26ecf7183be6c0aa4",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.2.0",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/archive/refs/tags/v1.2.0.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()
```

Interesting changes from the last version include:
* Add Mend renovate and use it to update some dependencies
* set the `BUILD_WORKING_DIRECTORY` env var which helps with building CLIs that accept relative file paths (https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/58)
* Explicitly re-set the `RUNFILES_DIR` env var to the runfiles of the binary target, not of the appimage rule itself. This fixes the `runfiles.bash` setup handling. `https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/58)
* The variables set in the appimage target's `env` attr are now available also when running the appimage without `bazel run` by re-exporting them in the AppRun entrypoint https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/59
* The `env` attr dict of the binary target is preserved and updated with the appimage target's `env` attr dict when possible. Note that all not all rulesets and versions of Bazel support this. For example, rules_python does not work yet, and rules_cc works with Bazel >= 6. https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/pull/59

`WORKSPACE` setup:
```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "f4be008c95adfd3c610ba9c12cc38b58eda3ea62d4ef6bf25f9fb3d746fd6b34",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/archive/refs/tags/v1.1.0.tar.gz",
    patch_cmds = ["rm -r tests"],
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()
```

name: v1.0.1
body:
Interesting changes from the last version include:
* rules_python is not a "runtime" dependency anymore. It's removed from the `rules_appimage_deps()` function
* Using `maybe` rules for http_archives
* CI changes

The `appimage` and `appimage_test` rules have not changed since the last release.

`WORKSPACE` setup:
```Starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_appimage",
    sha256 = "eb3065a2e0f26b01c85020baa73528f6d2f6fdcbfeb12d2d486cb388fc449597",
    strip_prefix = "rules_appimage-1.0.1",
    url = "https://github.com/lalten/rules_appimage/archive/refs/tags/v1.0.1.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_appimage//:deps.bzl", "rules_appimage_deps")

rules_appimage_deps()
```
This has been stable for a while, so why not claim this is v1.0.0 :)
